content:
## n8n@0.87.1 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.87.0...n8n@0.87.1) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-10-15 - Bug Fixes - Gmail: Fixed an issue with the Message ID - HTTP Request: Fixed an issue with the GET Request - Added `HMAC-SHA512` signature method for OAuth 1.0
